title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Engineering Mathematics Education for Engineering Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply trigonometric functions, vectors, and differential equations to mathematically model engineering problems
Learners can negotiate and present mathematical solutions to engineering design problems through team-based problem-solving activities
Learners can summarize key math concepts with over 80% accuracy through pre-learning videos and smartphone-based quizzes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
